desc_fr: Apprenez qui passe en premier. Comprenez les panneaux, les marquages au sol, et la priorité à droite.
desc_en: Learn who goes first. Understand signs, road markings, and priority to the right.
tip: Questions often hide missing signs. If no sign, think priority to the right.

desc_fr: Retenez les vitesses selon la route, la météo, et le véhicule. Ajoutez distances de sécurité et freinage.
desc_en: Memorize speeds by road, weather, and vehicle. Add safety distances and braking.
tip: Speed questions often include rain, fog, or young driver scenarios.

desc_fr: Sachez quand dépasser est interdit. Comprenez arrêt, stationnement, et zones dangereuses.
desc_en: Know when overtaking is forbidden. Understand stopping, parking, and dangerous zones.
tip: If visibility is limited, overtaking often becomes forbidden.

desc_fr: Travaillez les panneaux de danger et d’interdiction. Comprenez lignes continues, discontinues, et feux.
desc_en: Study warning and prohibition signs. Understand solid lines, broken lines, and traffic lights.
tip: A solid line means no crossing. Even for overtaking.
